content:
Attention teenagers in the UK!

You can learn about the Quantum world...in Pictures! Take our free course and upon completing you get a Certificate and a free signed limited-edition copy of our book Quantum in Pictures.

A subscribe link is in the 1st comment.
FLYER.jpeg

The restrictions on country and age, and also rather mentioning dodo-book than the actual textbook, Quantum in Pictures, where all needed to get ethical approval from Oxford University, given that the latter is published by ourselves in Quantinuum.
